New Records: Shakib Al Hasan scored his first fifty in 20 T20I innings
Key Match Events: Rishad Hossain struck three times in four balls to change the course of the game
Mustafizur Rahman's cutters proved too much to handle in the 19th over
Netherlands fell in a heap, losing 4 for 6 in the space of 16 balls
Pre-Game Insights: Bangladesh made a big stride towards securing a Super Eights berth at the T20 World Cup 2024
Post-Match Reflections: Shakib Al Hasan expressed happiness with the way he contributed to the team's win
Mustafizur Rahman said that Bangladesh's bowlers tightened the screws to restrict Netherlands
Miscellaneous Highlights: Sri Lanka are out of contention to qualify from Group D
Bangladesh kept chipping away to collect 47 runs off the last four overs
Michael Levitt had a dismal start to his T20 World Cup with scores of 1 and 0 against Nepal and South Africa
